function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low client satisfaction and service quality in the Indian construction and real estate sector","Impact":"Decreased trust, reputation damage, and reduced business opportunities","Mitigation":"Implement quality management systems, improve planning and cost estimation, enhance risk management skills","Technologies":"Quality management software, project planning software, risk assessment tools","People":"Clients, investors, end-users","Owner":"Construction companies, real estate developers"},{"Description":"Low prevalence of lean construction and skilled contractors/workers","Impact":"Increased project costs, delays, and quality issues","Mitigation":"Training programs for lean construction, investment in skills development, collaboration with skilled contractors and workers","Technologies":"Lean construction techniques, training simulators, skills assessment tools","People":"Contractors, workers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, industry associations"},{"Description":"Lack of value-based approach in Indian construction sector","Impact":"Inefficient project delivery, cost overruns, and reduced project value","Mitigation":"Implementation of value engineering, adoption of value-based project management approaches, collaboration with other countries for best practices","Technologies":"Value engineering techniques, project management software, benchmarking tools","People":"Project managers, engineers, stakeholders","Owner":"Government agencies, industry regulators"}]}
